attributes.action: Stop the Redbridge Council moving Church End Ward from Area 2 Committee to Area 1 Committee
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The London Borough of Redbridge want to transfer Church End Ward from the Area 2 Committee to Area 1 Committee.
This would mean that the Conservatives would have the Chairmanship of both Area 1 & 2 Committees.  It would also mean that Cabinet Officers would not have to face diffucult questions over land disposals in South Woodford from residents and local businesses in the Area.
The transfer would not be in the interest of either the residents or local businesses in the Ward.
